alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Lawrence County through 515 PM EDT... At 435 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Massena, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Massena, Norfolk, Louisville, Waddington, Norwood, Massena International Airport - Richards Field, Madrid, Chipman, North Stockholm, Eisenhower Lock, St. Lawrence State Park, West Stockholm, and Raymondville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
